name: Gunungan
description:
Gunungan, in Javanese culture is a symbol of life. Every picture in it symbolizes the entire universe.

The house or hall symbolizes a safe, peaceful and happy life.

Two guards represent by twin giants symbolizes the guardians of the dark and light realms

The giant image is used as a symbol associated with human life as message to people who have sinned, they will be put into a hell full of torments.

The fire on the top is a symbol of basic human needs

The tree symbolizes a person's life path
